name: Iris (mattmora)
description:
Controls:

An endless musical shmupish game loosely inspired by the John Coltrane track of the same name. For 1 or 2 players locally. 

Blue bird: 

  • ESDF = Move
  • A + Hold = Triple shot
  • A + Release on the beat = Power shot

Red bird: 

  • IJKL = Move
  • Semicolon + Hold =  Triple shot
  • Semicolon + Release on the off beat = Power shot
